attributes.name: Bile-Soaked Meat
attributes.description: Raw flesh marinaded in the fetid bile of the Withered.
attributes.parsed_description: Raw flesh marinaded in the fetid bile of the Withered.

attributes.name: Billiam's Astrolabe
attributes.description: Still finely tuned to the turning of the stars.
attributes.parsed_description: Still finely tuned to the turning of the stars.

attributes.name: Billiam's Sea Charts
attributes.description: Charts that map the rough seas outside of Aeternum.
attributes.parsed_description: Charts that map the rough seas outside of Aeternum.

attributes.name: Billiam's Sextant
attributes.description: Harkening back to happier days when Billiam was at sea.
attributes.parsed_description: Harkening back to happier days when Billiam was at sea.

attributes.name: Bison Meat
attributes.description: Red meat of the bison variety.
attributes.parsed_description: Red meat of the bison variety.

attributes.name: Blackened Sinew
attributes.description: Strands of sinew that are jet-black with corruption and a grisly red. Its otherworldly flexibility makes it perfect for a bow.
attributes.parsed_description: Strands of sinew that are jet-black with corruption and a grisly red. Its otherworldly flexibility makes it perfect for a bow.

attributes.name: Blackened Talisman
attributes.description: A blackened talisman of unknown origin, bearing a simple symbol.
attributes.parsed_description: A blackened talisman of unknown origin, bearing a simple symbol.

attributes.name: Blackened Talisman
attributes.description: A blackened talisman of unknown origin, bearing a simple symbol.
attributes.parsed_description: A blackened talisman of unknown origin, bearing a simple symbol.

attributes.name: Black Pigment
attributes.description: A sample of midnight black pigment that can be turned into ink.
attributes.parsed_description: A sample of midnight black pigment that can be turned into ink.

attributes.name: Black Pigment
attributes.description: Used in dye crafting to create dyes in shades of black and grey.
attributes.parsed_description: Used in dye crafting to create dyes in shades of black and grey.

attributes.name: Black Powder Fuses
attributes.description: Fuses used in Corrupted explosives.
attributes.parsed_description: Fuses used in Corrupted explosives.

attributes.name: Black Powder Horn
attributes.description: Used for making highly explosive bombs.
attributes.parsed_description: Used for making highly explosive bombs.

attributes.name: Blade of l'Olonnois
attributes.description: A fractured blade rumored to have been used by a great pirate.
attributes.parsed_description: A fractured blade rumored to have been used by a great pirate.

attributes.name: Blade of the Brutes
attributes.description: Blades once used by those not afraid of stabbing a friend in the back.
attributes.parsed_description: Blades once used by those not afraid of stabbing a friend in the back.

attributes.name: Blessed Crucible
attributes.description: This crucible contains a white-hot, molten metal, yet its exterior is cool to the touch.
attributes.parsed_description: This crucible contains a white-hot, molten metal, yet its exterior is cool to the touch.

attributes.name: Blessed Dryad Vines
attributes.description: Tendrils of vine blessed into peculiar shapes by the Dryads of Malevolence.
attributes.parsed_description: Tendrils of vine blessed into peculiar shapes by the Dryads of Malevolence.

attributes.name: Blessed Iron Blank
attributes.description: An iron blank for arrowheads, blessed by a variety of religious leaders.
attributes.parsed_description: An iron blank for arrowheads, blessed by a variety of religious leaders.

attributes.name: Blessed Obelisk Key
attributes.description: A key which grants access to the Crypt of the Regent.
attributes.parsed_description: A key which grants access to the Crypt of the Regent.

attributes.name: Blessed Scepter
attributes.description: A segment of a life staff thought lost to the ages. Upon touching it, the means to rebuild it dance in your mind. What should you do?
attributes.parsed_description: A segment of a life staff thought lost to the ages. Upon touching it, the means to rebuild it dance in your mind. What should you do?

attributes.name: Blessing of the Angry Earth
attributes.description: A Blessing earned from the Angry Earth in Edengrove.
attributes.parsed_description: A Blessing earned from the Angry Earth in Edengrove.

attributes.name: Blighted Growth
attributes.description: An unpleasant chunk of fungus, carved from the back of a Blighted Dryad
attributes.parsed_description: An unpleasant chunk of fungus, carved from the back of a Blighted Dryad

attributes.name: Blight Fungus
attributes.description: A sample of blight taken from the outbreak at Litheltop.
attributes.parsed_description: A sample of blight taken from the outbreak at Litheltop.

attributes.name: Blightmoth Dust
attributes.description: The dust shed by a Blightmoth.
attributes.parsed_description: The dust shed by a Blightmoth.

attributes.name: Blightroot Flower
attributes.description: Its alchemical properties are especially useful in potion crafting.
attributes.parsed_description: Its alchemical properties are especially useful in potion crafting.

attributes.description: Its alchemical properties are especially useful in potion crafting.
